name: Indecisive Magic Boy
description:
A small game made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1.

You control a mage that is trying to decide whether school of magic he will follow, ice or fire. The mage can cast spells of both types, but if he casts more fire spells his temperature will rise, and his temperature will go down if ice spells are cast.

Objective:

Defeat all enemies and go to the door at the end of the level.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Mouse Button: Fire Spells

Right Mouse Button: Ice Spells
